website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable synthetic sheet set that, unlike some microfiber competitors, is neither hot nor restrictive.
cons: Some wrinkling and color loss over time

customer_reviews.title: Not my type of "1500 thread count "feel"".
customer_reviews.text: What a surprise, its my own fault for not reading the fine print, I expected 1500 thread count.... not microfiber. I guess I've become a sheet snob. These are below my expectations and quality. They are paper thin, workmanship quality is poor, seams aren't finished.There is elastic" strings" encased that the material slides along,which will break soon, it isn't flat elastic "sewn" in the edges. And they are loose fitting, meaning I'll have re-tuck all 4 sides everyday to get them smoothed. Not worth the aggravation of returning...
customer_reviews.author: JBella

customer_reviews.title: Egyptian Cotton? Or microfiber?
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving 4 stars because the description and the package say these are 1500 thread count Egyptian cotton but the actual sheets themselves do not say what they are made of anywhere, just instructions on how to wash them. But, in fine print on the back of the package says they are "they are made of high strength micro fiber yarns." I believe they are microfiber. I have another set of sheets that look (stitching and all) and feel exactly the same and they are microfiber. However, they are comfortable sheets. I've only washed them once and they shed in the dryer like crazy. Hopefully that's only because they are new.
customer_reviews.author: The MillersTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: worse sheets ever
customer_reviews.text: I hate these sheets! They are beautiful to look at but give off so much lint. There is orange lint on my clothing, my hair, my rugs, my dog. I have washed them several times and they continue the shed lint balls and orange lint dust. They are very soft but messy.
customer_reviews.author: Maieee

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expected for price
customer_reviews.text: I was not thrilled with the fitted sheet having one continuous piece of elastic instead of the four I expect at the corners, but it did not create any problem with putting the sheet on the bed and having it stay in place. It fits deeper mattresses well. The color and texture were what I expected and have not changed after being washed following the manufacturer's directions. I do like the pockets on the side openings of the pillow cases to keep the pillows from slipping out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Good deal! Quality linens.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sheets, I bought them as spares for a guest bedroom. The color is as deep, rich, and even as pictured. The stitching is good with no loose threads. The 1500 thread count, though i'm sure is true, does not feel as soft as some i've experienced before. I washed them twice with extra fabric softener before using them for guests and theyre great!
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great!
customer_reviews.text: The color was true to the picture. The sheets are smooth and soft to sleep on. I think they are great considering the price is much lower than I usually pay for sheets. They have a great color selection and when I am ready to replace some of my fall/winter sheets I will definitely shop with this seller agaain.
customer_reviews.author: Susann E. DeViney

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: NOT WORTH THE MONEY! I just opened the package today. I washed the sheets and pillow cases on gentle/cold cycle as instructed and dried on low cycle before putting on the bed for the first time. Went to put the fitted sheet on the bed and the rubber band that is sewn into the fitted sheet to make it a fitted sheet snapped and broke. So now I'm stuck with essentially have two flat sheets. Very shoddy workmanship. Would definitely not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Niemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had returned
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are paper thin, I should have known by the price! We have an awful time finding good sheets for our split king, so when I saw these, I jumped on them. But we hate them, they are paper thin, and the elastic corners on the fitted sheets won't stay on. More often than not, we both wake up with the corners off our sheets. Plus, my husband has dry feet, and he says the fabric sticks to his feet...looks like I bought another bag of work rags...
customer_reviews.author: Angie Wall

customer_reviews.title: Seriously soft (though a little thin)
customer_reviews.text: So for as cheap as these sheets are they are REMARKABLY soft. My friend bet they would suck since they're so cheap but honestly, they are the softest sheets I own and way better than stuff you'd buy at BB&B for a lot less. The only drawback: They're a little thin, so my guess is they won't be lasting long. But truthfully for $35 just buy two sets, wash gently and rotate them so they last longer. You're still spending way less than you would for other sheet sets.
customer_reviews.author: Bendalie

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I got these sheets in orange and a light brown and I really enjoy them for as cheap as they were! theyre soft and airy which will be nice come summer but don't feel flimsy -Were hard on sheets people- Id absolutely recommend these to anyone needing new sheets but not wanting to spend an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic product with a great feel and excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly soft! I've owned these for almost a year and honestly they are my favorite sheet set. As such they are used quite frequently and have been washed many many times, still with perfect sticking and no decline in the structural integrity of the sheets nor in their smooth buttery texture. 10/10 would buy again (as I actually did and now have different colors to choose from!) and I have and will continue to recommend to friends/family.
customer_reviews.author: Shavon

customer_reviews.title: Not cotton
customer_reviews.text: They're not cotton. So they're really this thin, synthetic fabric, which is kind of soft, but kind of reminds me of something my grandmother had, and not in a good way. This is why they're inexpensive. I guess I just prefer the feel of natural fabrics. They're not bad, and my young daughter likes them fine, but after sleeping on nice, high thread count, real cotton sheets, I wouldn't choose these synthetic ones for myself.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoGarden

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for my sons bed
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my sons bed. The red is brilliant and bright in color and they are very soft. They fit loose with a little room, even with a foam mattress topper. So far we really like them, not sure how they'll hold up after lots of washes, so we'll see. They're right for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaAnn

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality for the price for a California king-sized bed. The best bargain in town! I ordered multiples in White and two types of Green so I can be fully stocked up as well as for my guest room which is queen size I bought white. Could not be happier. I am set. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Stay Cool, & Fits my Mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these sheets!!! So so soft. I tend to run pretty hot at night & they are wonderful! I don't get hot. I've washed them a couple of times now too & the color stayed & they're still feeling nice & soft. Also, the fitted sheet fits over my 12" mattress. It's so hard to find ones that do this! Love these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Blueposa

customer_reviews.title: Seam coming apart
customer_reviews.text: I really love how nice and soft the Elegant Comfort 1500 Thread Count Luxury Egyptian Quality Wrinkle and Fade Resistant 4-Piece Sheet Set. The price is very reasonable. But , after washing these sheets the first time I noticed the seam on the pillow case starting come apart.
customer_reviews.author: AK Kitten

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and bought these sheets because they were the right color. I was amazed at how soft and cool they are! I loved them so much I bought them for my mom. I love them. And they are wrinkle free! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Hettie C. Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet doesn't fit well
customer_reviews.text: The sheets and pillow cases feel soft, looks great and they're light weight. We don't have a pillow top mattress and the fitted sheet keeps coming off at the corners. Nearly every morning we need to pull the sheet down over one of the corners to make the bed. The fitted sheet just doesn't fit to the size of our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT deep pockets
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong with this item is that it is NOT deep pockets like they claim. I have constantly pull the fitted sheet down and tuck under the corners of my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Sheets doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are of good quality but, I found the king sheets weren’t tight to my bed. It’s was not smooth. The color was a true gold. Good thread count. I kept them and use them sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Denise T.

customer_reviews.title: Thin, flimsy, cheap!! NO WAY they’re 1500 count. Rip Off!! IVE  BEEN SCAMMED!!
customer_reviews.text: Thin, flimsy, cheap!! NO WAY they’re 1500 count. Rip Off!! IVE BEEN SCAMMED!!

customer_reviews.title: Luxury feeling at everyday price
customer_reviews.text: These sheets feel fabulously soft and smooth. This is actually our second pair, the first being for our guest bed. Our guests raved about the sheets so we bought a pair for our master bed as well. The sheets have held up well through multiple laundering cycles without pilling or failures. The range of colors for this product is great as well, you can find something to match or compliment almost any linen set or decor. We'll definitely be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Run2Swim

customer_reviews.title: NOT a 1500 thread count set
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a 1500 thread count set, if you read the product description and look closet at the packaging it says it has the "feel" of 1500 thread count. The sheets are VERY thin. 3 stars for misleading advertising. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Travis JD Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are very well made and extremely comfortable. Cool in the summer. I will purchase these again. I have purchased other sheets from Amazon and they were not nearly as nice and more expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We measured our Mattress before buying these to ensure they would not come off the bed during the night. Well..... guess what... they come off, we used them for 2 nights, then we had enough we don’t even use them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are amazing. Every other set we have had did not stay put like these do. We must toss and turn because with other sets we would wake up twisted up in sheets or the top one would be on the floor. These stay exactly where they should and are super soft. They do keep you warm which is a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: So so soft
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these sheets I ordered them because of the high reviews. I was skeptical because the price was so great! The package arrived on time and as described. My favorite part about these sheets is how wonderfully soft they are on the skin. WOW. They are so soft and smooth. My only critique would be that they retain quite a bit of heat. For the winter these sheets are perfection. I don't think they will be my warm weather sheets though. That being said, I am buying another set!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Hate them~! Don't buy~!!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are awful~! I like sheets that at least have a little stiffness . These sheets are limp and don't move with blankets, and the fitted sheet certainly doesn't stay over the mattress and comes undone every night~!! Becomes a fight to sleep comfortably every night! Already "pilled" up at foot area after only 2 months!! I ordered different sheets and am just out the money,
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Guess it was a typo!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how they arrived at 1500 thread count; should have been 150. Guess it was a typo! These sheets are not 1500.... I like the color, but the lack/quality of material is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: laura h.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of sheets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with my son's new comforter set. I got the lime green which is a nice bright color. These are great if you need deeper pocket sheets as they are a bit big on a standard bed with no pillow top. I washed these twice now (when I first got them and then again 2 weeks later). No issues. They are cool and smooth and my son seems to like them.
customer_reviews.author: Dinosaurs and Mermaids, mom of both

customer_reviews.title: The color was not what it looked like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: So they came quickly which was great, the price was right but I have gotten black sheets from them before and they were soft and the color was great. This time they look more greenish, I guess I am going to keep them but not what I expected...Not sure I will be ordering from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Mom wasn't impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom as a gift and she is unimpressed to say the least. She said they lost the softness after 1 wash and became a little scratchy. :(
customer_reviews.author: Marci Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Pure bliss
customer_reviews.text: I'm very particular about my sheets. Comfort and softness are components I'm willing to pay more for. I only purchased these because my previous 1000 count cotton sheets were wearing out. I paid $90 for those. These sheets are exceptionally softer and for less money too. About the best way I can describe them is "pure bliss". Merry Christmas to me.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: These feel very nice and are light weight
customer_reviews.text: These feel very nice and are light weight. I certainly would give them five stars because of the price, which is amazing, however, there are threads around the elastic on fitted sheets that are loose, so hope they hold up for a year. I have washed them three times wish cold water and a light heat drying setting. They still look good and color has't changed. I have purchased these for two beds, and the family like them. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Silimarin

customer_reviews.title: Repeat buyer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sheets! Our house owns these sheets in every color they make almost. We have also recommended these to many friends and family! These are my go to sheets!!! Definitely will be buying again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Piazza

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: This thing. Oh my god as soon as I slid my hand inside the still wrapped package I knew this was going to be heavenly. One of the best purchases I have made on amazon. It's hard for me to take it away to wash it as it just feels amazing. The only downside is that the comfort level tends to put me to sleep before romantic activities can happen. Which is fine. These sheets are basically my cure for insomnia.
customer_reviews.author: S. Keipper

customer_reviews.title: 3 years of Use, and still look Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets 3 years ago, and they are still my favorite set to throw on the bed for everyday use. Since I have found nothing negative to say, here are a list of the PROS------ 1) Deep pockets that fit my queen mattress with pillow top securely 2) Lasting rich color---I can tell you I have honestly washed them over a 100 times and still look great! 4) Stitching is even and decorative 5) Sheets stay cool and wrinkle free Over the last few years, the only sign of wear is mild fuzz piles in a few spot where my husband sleeps.
customer_reviews.author: Malissa L.

customer_reviews.title: Crap!!
customer_reviews.text: Crap!!! Do not buy if you want egyptian cotton! They say Egyptian Cotton in big letters, but then if you read the fine print it's really microfiber and so thin you could see through them! UGH!! Awful!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I have washed that first set at least twice a week ever since and it is still like new. Still soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a back up. I have a set that I purchased two and a half years ago. I have washed that first set at least twice a week ever since and it is still like new. Still soft. I have had expensive sheet that wore out in a fraction of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Smith

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft, but they are thinner than I had hoped. We are still happy with the purchase, though. My son loves them with his camouflage comforter set he got for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I bought two of this Sheet Set and I love it. It is super soft and comfortable. I intend to buy more of the same brand. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love these
customer_reviews.text: We have these sheets in our house, our deer lease camper, and now our summer place. You can't be the price and the quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: C. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: These don’t fit well.
customer_reviews.text: I would love the sheets if they would stay in place. My mattress is 14”, queen size, , but yet several corners come off during the night. I rarely move around during the night, am NOT a restless sleeper, but yet just laying down cause a corner to pop off. Consequently, I’m not terribly fond of these and would not order again. If the corners were deeper and larger, it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best sheets we have had for the best price
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, the best sheets we have had for the best price!!! Why buy more expensive sheets when these are super soft, durable and come in a large variety of colors!? If you're looking for a good soft, breathable sheet set, these are perfect. We have multiple sets in different colors and the colors are very vibrant and do not fade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, fits my mattress great and are very soft.. I'm only giving it 4 stars because upon opening the package, there were a lot of threads on both the sheets and pillow cases. I trimmed them off, and have washed them 3 times now and only an occasional extra thread, that I trim.
customer_reviews.author: KMTL

customer_reviews.title: Ripped second time they were washed.
customer_reviews.text: Washed these for the second time and went to put them back on my bed. Thought they were great sheets, comfortable and fit my mattress great, but they already have rips in them. They were washed with pillow cases so there were no zippers or any reason they should have ripped. Disappointed, especially since I ordered another set of them yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: JILL CHAGNON

customer_reviews.title: Butter sheets!
customer_reviews.text: My goodness this sheet feels sooo good! I am not a sheet expert in detecting the difference if a vendor says a sheet is 2000 thread count when its not. I do know however, I took a chance on this sheet based on the rave reviews about the softness of the sheet and ohhh-yeah it feels amazingly soft. After the first wash there were some what look like lint rolls on the sheet in the same colour of the sheet but it dusts right off and it did not leave evidence of it. I am going to purchase two more sets, I just need to decide on the colours!
customer_reviews.author: caribbeanQueen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful softness
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft. I bought a queen size set and they are large (may fit a king, lol) but I had already washed them and they are very soft. Remind me of perfectly worn flannel sheets - that type of soft. So, I just tucked the extra and made it work. So worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J Olson

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft! I waked them immediately after opening using standard detergent, softener, and bleach. They were fast to dry & came out soft! I'd give 5 stars if the flay sheet had piping like the pillow cases. Also, the back lining of the pillow cases is NOT sewn to the case --- this little flap is meant to encompass a pillow edge (to secure the case to the pillow).
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and silky soft!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets feel amazing! I too have had high end sheets like some other reviewers, but wanted something lightweight and silky soft which is exactly what I received! The post says "Elegant Comfort 1500 Thread Count Luxury Egyptian QUALITY Wrinkle and Fade Resistant 4-Piece Sheet Set, Queen, Aqua" so I don't know why people are saying it's false advertisement... The description does not state that these sheets are Egyptian cotton...smh... Took a star off because I ordered aqua which turned out to be a beautiful baby blue... Will definitely order additional sets...
customer_reviews.author: Mugsy

customer_reviews.title: These are the softest sheets I have every had.
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are so soft to sleep on. I have ordered more I like them so much.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ohlert

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, fantastic sheets
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color, fantastic sheets. They wash well and are so comfortable to sleep in. I bought 4 sets for the family. They sale these at festivals for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I will never not give these sheets good reviews. I've ordered probably 4 different colors and they are all so soft. They fit my bed well and are easy to wash and dry. They haven't faded - even my black ones - which is sometimes a worry with cheaper sheets. You seriously cannot beat the quality of these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julesie_O

customer_reviews.title: ... "exact" sheets about a year ago in Navy and LOVED THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these "exact" sheets about a year ago in Navy and LOVED THEM!! They are so soft and my very favorite sheets. I'm changing my room over to black instead of navy and so I went back and looked at what I previously bought, hit the reorder button and changed the color to black (ordered some in lime for the guest room as well). These are NOT the same sheets. They came in the same package and have the same name, but they are not anywhere near as soft as the ones I previously bought. Quality has gone down. Sad...
customer_reviews.author: Angela Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOO SOFT
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets. They're a soft material and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Hooligans

customer_reviews.title: Softest sheets ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had my share of sheets down through the years, some good and some not so good. But these sheets are the best that I have found, they fit my CA king bed with pride☺️. My husband was well pleased also. I have bought 2 sets for my bed another set for my guest room and I plan on getting more. An extra note they have matching duvet covers that make your bed look and feel rich and inviting.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J

customer_reviews.title: Best buy by far!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I've bought this year. The quality of the sheets is outstanding and the price can't be beat! I bought a much higher priced set from a well known store that started "pilling" after only a few washings so I was a little skeptical when I saw the price of these. I decided I wouldn't be out that much money if they didn't hold up. Now I'll never buy sheets anywhere else! I would recommend this seller to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Mardis

customer_reviews.title: I really like these sheets
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sheets. They are crispy! Haha they are not hot and yet not cold to get into. Just like goldilocks...just right. They are made with big pockets and my bed is not so they fit a little oddly, bit LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sheets.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these sheets. The pillow cases have an extra flap to completely cover the pillow inside.
customer_reviews.author: Allex English

customer_reviews.title: Run a Bit Large
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are supposed to be for a double/full size bed, however they are rather loose fitting on my mattress. That being said, they are soft and wonderful to sleep in, it's like sleeping in a creamsicle (citrus scent not included). The color is true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Smooth sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are extremely comfortable and wash and dry great. They feel very soft and silky and they keep really cool. I haven't had any tears or rips in them and they seem pretty durable. The color matches nice with my new dark red, gold and brown comfortable. If you use any body butter or any oil on your body it will stain the sheets but the stains will wash right out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly pleasant quality, durability and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our daughter's bed for Halloween season. Ironically they've been the most durable and provided the most lasting comfort of the beddings we've bought over the last year
customer_reviews.author: Dan Fruzzetti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Finally put these on the bed. The color was just as described and so was the fit. Nice and soft. I have a deep pocket, pillow top mattress and they fit quite well. I may purchase me another color at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but the shams are different
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Microfiber is really warm at night, so I don't recommend these sheets if you have a warm and muggy room. I love the feel of the sheets and how easy care they are. The color is clear, not at all muddy, and looks great. My shams do not have the border as pictured, but they do have a bit of embroidery on the edge with the opening for the pillow. Pretty, but not as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: Got the purple for my daughter and absolutely love the color wish I had it for myself! Very soft and comfy makes it even harder to get her out of bed!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Please save your money!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could express my disappointment in these sheets!! When I picked up the box they came in I was struck at how light it was (for containing a set of queen sheets). Well, that's because they were identical in thickness & feel to my grandmas sheets that are 65 years old! Literally!! Virtually see through! No thank you! I want a set of sheets that are soft, crisp, & have some weight to them!! Save yourself some money and just go to a Kohls or TJMaxx website and get some that are on sale. I wound up doing that and I am in love with my new Laura Ashley sheet set, marked down 70%!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Kingrey

customer_reviews.title: so soft
customer_reviews.text: I got these sheets for my guest room about a year ago. My mom loved them so much, I bought another set for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: colors ran out
customer_reviews.text: it's soft and comfortable, but after the initial washing the colors faded dramatically from vibrant purple to almost brown purple
customer_reviews.author: l.d.

customer_reviews.title: These fit more like a king than a cali king but still a ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the California King size for our king bed because king sheets pull up on the sides all the time. These fit more like a king than a cali king but still a nice soft set of sheets for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Courtnee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. Will not last
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst set of sheets I have ever purchased. I have used these for 1 week now and the pillow cases are already ripping at the seams. This product is poorly made. Yes the sheets feel amazing however they didn't even make it to the washing machine before they ripped. Sheets should not rip!!! especially in a week. I have owned sheets for years that never ripped. I will be returning these and looking for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Robitaille

customer_reviews.title: great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sheets about 2 years ago, and I still love them. They held up great throughout washes. They're just as soft As they were when they were brand new. There's no pilling, and they have not faded at all (mine are black). Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great color selection
customer_reviews.text: Thin and super wrinkly but super soft and smooth. I love these sheets! I get hot at night so breathable sheets work for me. Love the way they feel to the touch. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DexterousDiva

customer_reviews.title: Best Sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I won't buy any other sheets - these are by far my favorite. Somehow they keep me warm in NYC winters yet cool in NYC summers all in one! They fit my queen mattress just fine and have held up well. I have another set that I've had for 3-4 years now and they're still great.
customer_reviews.author: Katie in NYC

customer_reviews.title: Cheap sheets
customer_reviews.text: Transaction & delivery was fine but the product itself is very cheaply made. For a 1500 thread count sheet set, I was expecting much better quality sheets. Although these sheets are very soft , they are very thinly made and in fact , the bottom sheet was even accidentally sewn together to itself on one of the corners . I had to pull it apart , taking the chance that it might rip but luckily it didn't . Who knows how long these sheets will last for . Nothing against the seller but I would not purchase these sheets again.
customer_reviews.author: lisa michelle royce

customer_reviews.title: great sheets
customer_reviews.text: so far love these sheets! will purchase more in the future!
customer_reviews.author: T Todd

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are OK not quite what I expected. They don't have the collar at the top of the sheet for one. I don't think there's any such thing as a 1500 thread count. As far as I know it only goes up to 800. But these are nice soft sheets.
customer_reviews.author: kevin32810

customer_reviews.title: Super soft sheets
customer_reviews.text: I am happily shocked at how soft these sheets are. Sure, they are not as heavy as my Egyptian cotton 1500tc sheets, but for the inexpensive price, you can't beat them. I will be ordering more for sure! They launder very well also.
customer_reviews.author: catsinjax

customer_reviews.title: Not so good a week into using them my brother told me ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother as he had no fitted sheet for his bed. He loves them. UPDATE: Not so good a week into using them my brother told me they got a hole in them and that the fitted sheet does not hold to the bed.
customer_reviews.author: GLORIA NAU

customer_reviews.title: Super soft
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets! They are so soft! Fits my mattress perfectly. I'll buy more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: D. Coble

customer_reviews.title: They don't make 'em like they used to
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these sheets twice - once in early 2016 and again in December 2017. The first set was great, but clearly something has changed over at "Elegant Comfort". The sheets are soft, I will give them that - but they are paper thin now and pill like crazy. They're probably worth whatever you're paying, but I would suggest spending twice the money for sheets that are ten times the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: Love these sheets. I've had them for a bit now and have washed them, still holding up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ldeb

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased these sheet several times with no issues ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these sheet several times with no issues. This particular set wore out in 2 weeks. My daughter had the flu and was in bed for a week. Her sitting in bed simply made holes in the sheets :(.
customer_reviews.author: Mom5

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my mother in law, she loved them and was happy over all.
customer_reviews.author: Lbm11jessica

customer_reviews.title: loved all the color selections
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for my father-in-law who is quite tough sheets. As he is elderly and is in bed quite a bit. First, loved all the color selections! We ordered the Prime one day delivery and received them in time to change out his old sheets and have the new ones in time for bed. They were soft without feeling too satin-y. Even though a blend, we still like the feel of a regular soft fabric feel that is not too silky. These sheets really did the trick. Look great. Feel great and he is even sleeping longer, (which, of course is a whole other thing!!)
customer_reviews.author: Jet Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are soft. They didn't have a stinky smell like most new sheets do. They fit properly the color is slightly off from the picture but close enough to what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Consistently Exceed Expectations
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I really love Elegant Comfort brand 1500 thread count materials. The micro-fiber sheets keep me cool in the summer and are always soft to the touch. They do not tear easily, mostly in the corners from stretching. Given the price and quality, I'm happy to replace my sheets every other year and get new designs & colors.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Farnum

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. As for the durability issue time will tell. I'll let you know in a yrar or so
customer_reviews.author: James J. Zendrosky

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft & keeps me cool at night. I'm glad I purchased these on prime day.
customer_reviews.author: peacewithin4me

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are elegant, smooth, deeply colored and very comfortable sheets which we're saving for our guests who float on an air mattress in the 4th floor loft.
customer_reviews.author: Ted E. Tollefson

customer_reviews.title: Butter is better!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sheets EVER!!! Like sleeping in butter, but without all the mess. If you have a TRUE deep pocket mattress, these will fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: NOPE, these sheets began to fall apart IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.text: These sheets started pilling within just a few minutes on sitting and moving around on them. If you rub the fabric between your fingers the pills quickly start to form. These pills latched themselves to my blankets, clothes, and whatever else happened to rest on my bed. I returned these ASAP because I was not about to lint roll my sheets every day.
customer_reviews.author: Polyester-Blend

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fit very well
customer_reviews.text: Wife absolutely loves these sheets she informed me that I will be ordering another set for our bed very soon .
customer_reviews.author: Al Dolge

customer_reviews.title: I do like the feel of these but because they don't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set of sheets that I purchased off of Amazon. as with the first set, I took them out of the package and washed them before putting them on. Unlike the first set these sheets didn't have any loose threads after washing them. It advertises that they fit up to an 18" deep mattress. Well, if you got a hell of grip and can manage to pull these until the brink of tearing, then yes. I do like the feel of these but because they don't fit the mattress right, I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is soft however they knot up really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Collum

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are super soft and ready to sleep on straight out of the package. Most sheets require numerous washings before that stiff, scratchy feeling is worked out of them, but these are perfect. The thread count is high enough they are extremely soft and comfortable. My husband and I both love these and highly recommend...I even bought a set for my mom for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly, New Mexico

customer_reviews.title: Great, Just a lot thinner than they sounded in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great,Just a lot thinner than they sounded in the add.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sheets ever
customer_reviews.text: I have never had such lovely soft sheets. They may not be Egyptian cotton but they sure feel like it. The sizing is just right also for my deep pocket mattress. I will be ordering more and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I needed sheets that were cool and were pet friendly. These sheets were just that. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: SOFT!
customer_reviews.text: Soft. Soft. Soft. Soft. What more can I say? I bought the grey first. I loved the sheets so much I purchased the black. Even my husband commented on how soft they were....not something he usually pays attention to! The deep pockets fit my thick mattress better than other sheets I have.
customer_reviews.author: M.C. from STL

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right
customer_reviews.text: Not the light pink color they look like in the picture. More of a magenta color. Nice feel to the sheets but after the first wash the seams were already loose.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Combs

product_meta.title: Elegant Comfort 1500 Thread Count Wrinkle & Fade Resistant 4 pc Sheet Set, Deep Pocket Up to 18" and Colors, Queen White
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Color:WhiteEnjoy a Experience of a true luxury and a cool comfortable night's sleep with exceptionally thin breathable Sheet set that have a silky soft feel and a lustrous finish. This Sheet set provide a lasting vibrancy of color no matter how often they are washed and are made of high strength micro fiber yarns that will stay soft silky and wrinkle free for years. Soft to the touch, easy care No ironing necessary. Elegant Comfort NOTE : TWIN SIZE SHEET IS 3 PC SET. --- IT COMES WITH ONLY 1 PILLOWCASE
feature_bullets: 1 Flat Sheet (92" x 102") 1 Fitted Sheet (60" x 80") and 2 Standard Pillow Cases (20" x 30")
Fits mattresses up to 14" - 18" deep with elastic all around the fitted sheet
Micro fiber sheets are as soft as 1,500 thread count Egyptian cotton
Easy care sheets are machine washable and require no ironing
Elegant Comfort - High Quality and has a breathable weave
